title: Today Could Be A Turning Point In American History (Ep 1821)
description:
In this episode, I address the exploding national crisis which could change American history. 

News Picks:


Killing of top Al Qaeda leader raises some questions. 

Top US economist 'fact-checked' by Facebook for stating the country is in a recession.

Taiwan cancels leave of some soldiers ‘to immediately prepare for war.’

Young Voters Are Abandoning Biden — Here’s Why.

DOJ: Militia Group Cannot Blame Trump for Entering Capitol on January 6.

Are we headed for ANOTHER quarter of negative growth?

Biden online asylum system an 'open invitation for Chinese spies' to enter US, key senator warns.

An update on Elon and twitter.

content:encoded:
In this episode, I address the exploding national crisis which could change American history. 


News Picks:

  • Killing of top Al Qaeda leader raises some questions. 
  • Top US economist 'fact-checked' by Facebook for stating the country is in a recession.
  • Taiwan cancels leave of some soldiers ‘to immediately prepare for war.’
  • Young Voters Are Abandoning Biden — Here’s Why.
  • DOJ: Militia Group Cannot Blame Trump for Entering Capitol on January 6.
  • Are we headed for ANOTHER quarter of negative growth?
  • Biden online asylum system an 'open invitation for Chinese spies' to enter US, key senator warns.
  • An update on Elon and twitter.
